title: Deep Learning Predictive Modeling Based on Wireless Energy Transfer and Full-Duplex (FD) IoT Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wireless communication, understanding of IoT systems, and experience with deep learning frameworks
context.additional_context: Training for real-time network performance optimization in manufacturing automation environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze energy transfer mechanisms and signal interference models in FD IoT networks
Learners can design a model to predict average BLER and throughput in wireless networks using deep learning frameworks
Learners can compare performance differences between CNN-based prediction models and traditional methods to select optimal algorithms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
